original_title: Toys of Christmas Past: TV Ads From the 50's, 60's, 70's
overview: Tons of nostalgic toy commercials of the 50's, 60s, & 70's! Lionel & American Flyer trains, Mr. Machine, Great Garloo, Mystery Date, Creepy Crawlers, Astro Base, Robot Commando, Batmobile Car Kit, Lone Ranger Rapid-Fire Revolver, Action Baseball, Gaylord, Mr. Potato Head, GI Joe, Barbie, Rock'em-Sock'em Robots, Lie Detector Game, Silly Putty, Fascination, Etch-A-Sketch, Tiny Tears, Slinky & more!
title: Toys of Christmas Past: TV Ads From the 50's, 60's, 70's
